definition: any broad thin and limber covering attached at one edge, pronounce with a flap, of alveolar sounds
details:
noun
- any broad thin and limber covering attached at one edge
- a movable airfoil that is part of an aircraft wing
= synonyms: flaps
- a movable piece of tissue partly connected to the body
- the motion made by flapping up and down
= synonyms: flutter
- an excited state of agitation
= synonyms: fuss
verb
- pronounce with a flap, of alveolar sounds
- make a fuss
= synonyms: dither, pother
- move noisily
= example: move noisily
= synonyms: bang
- move in a wavy pattern or with a rising and falling motion
= synonyms: roll
- move with a flapping motion
= example: move with a flapping motion
- move with a thrashing motion
= example: move with a thrashing motion
